text: Takymy ye poslantsi. Odnym iz nykh My viddaly perevahu nad inshymy. YE sered nykh taki, z yakymy hovoryv Allah, a deyakykh Vin pidnis na [vyshchi] shchabli. I My daruvaly yasni znamennya Ici, synu Marʺyam, i My pidtrymaly yoho Svyatym Dukhom. Yakby Allah pobazhav, to ti, shcho zhyly pislya nykh, ne vely b mizh soboyu borotʹby pislya toho, yak pryyshly do nykh yasni znamennya. Ale vony roziyshlysya mizh soboyu, i chastyna iz nykh uviruvala, a chastyna ne uviruvala. Ta yakby pobazhav Allah, vony ne vely b mizh soboyu borotʹby. Ale Allah robytʹ te, shcho pobazhaye
